content.raw:
@{5cf75629ff02b50ea27b2817} I completed all steps as suggested, but didn’t answer my question.

When I run `ign launch -v 4 competition.ign robotName1:=X4 robotConfig1:=X4_SENSOR_CONFIG_2`, `/X4/front/image_raw` is a published rostopic that is a color image, and `/X4/rgbd_camera/depth/points/` is a published rostopic that is a PointCloud2. Those both work fine. What I’m looking for is the rostopic for the depth image that shows up in ignition \(shown below\) and correlates to the `/rgbd_camera/depth/image_raw` topic from gazebo 9. 

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/2721254234-screenshot.png)
content.html:
@Alfredo Bencomo I completed all steps as suggested, but didn’t answer my question.

When I run ign launch -v 4 competition.ign robotName1:=X4 robotConfig1:=X4_SENSOR_CONFIG_2, /X4/front/image_raw is a published rostopic that is a color image, and /X4/rgbd_camera/depth/points/ is a published rostopic that is a PointCloud2. Those both work fine. What I’m looking for is the rostopic for the depth image that shows up in ignition (shown below) and correlates to the /rgbd_camera/depth/image_raw topic from gazebo 9.
